item.title: 对冲基金创始人德国税务欺诈洗钱指控被撤销
item.description: 对冲基金创始人桑杰-沙阿（Sanjay Shah）在一起 3.3 亿欧元（约合 3.74 亿美元）的案件中被指控洗钱，但在丹麦的一起类似起诉中被定罪后，德国撤销了对他的指控。【原文：German money laundering charges against hedge fund founder Sanjay Shah in a €330 million ($374 million) case were dropped after his conviction in a similar Danish prosecution.】

item.title: 印度短期债券因有望获得创纪录的印度央行红利而反弹
item.description: 由于预期印度央行将在本周晚些时候派发丰厚的股息，政府借贷成本在一次债券拍卖中降至三年来的最低点。【原文：Shorter-tenor Indian bonds are leading a rally, with the government borrowing costs dropping to a three-year low at a bill auction on expectations of a bumper dividend payout from the central bank later this week.】

item.title: 中央银行维持利率不变，半数土耳其企业陷入亏损
item.description: 随着借贷成本接近 50%，对经济硬着陆的担忧与日俱增，曾经支持央行回归正统货币政策的土耳其公司现在普遍报告亏损。【原文：Turkish companies that once backed the central bank’s return to orthodox monetary policy are now reporting widespread losses, as borrowing costs near 50% and fears of a hard landing grow.】

item.title: 交易员警惕班夫协议令美元进一步下挫
item.description:
七国集团财长正在加拿大举行会议 

G-7 finance ministers are meeting in Canada 

】

item.title: 俄罗斯顶级石油生产商收购西伯利亚巨型稀土矿藏
item.description: 俄罗斯最大的石油生产商购买了一个巨大的西伯利亚稀土矿，这可能成为与美国合作的一个领域。【原文：Russia’s largest oil producer bought a giant Siberian rare-earth deposit, which may become an area of cooperation with the US.】

item.title: 日本央行听证会凸显对债券缩减步伐的不同看法
item.description: 两天来，日本央行听取了市场参与者对其应多快缩减债券购买的不同意见，这些意见将有助于指导其量化紧缩计划，因为债券市场出现了紧张的迹象。【原文：The Bank of Japan heard mixed views from market participants over two days on how quickly it should taper its bond buying, input that will help guide its quantitative tightening plans as signs of strain build in the bond market.】

item.title: 马斯克歪曲特斯拉销量暴跌的市场现状
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对今年欧洲汽车市场的状况做出了错误的描述，他说特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Elon Musk mischaracterized the state of Europe’s auto market this year when he said Tesla Inc. is seeing sales decline along with every other carmaker.】

item.title: 英国和欧盟因技术问题延长债务拍卖截止日期
item.description: 针对彭博社 LP 的技术问题，英国和欧盟周三延长了债务拍卖的投标窗口。【原文：The UK and European Union extended the bidding window for debt auctions on Wednesday in response to Bloomberg LP technical issues.】

item.title: 百度在中国人工智能大战中报告收入意外增长
item.description: 中国互联网搜索行业的领军企业百度公司抵御了人工智能领域愈演愈烈的竞争和持续的经济衰退，营收超过预期。【原文：Baidu Inc.’s revenue beat estimates, after China’s internet search leader fended off intensifying competition in AI and a persistent economic downturn.】

item.title: 美国股市需要盈利提振才能重新超越全球同行
item.description: 美国股市在经历了六周的疯狂反弹后，今年在全球股市中仍处于落后地位。彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）的分析师说，美股要想持续反弹并夺回往日的头把交椅，美国企业的利润引擎就必须重新启动。【原文：Six weeks into a torrid rebound, US stocks are still laggards in global equity markets this year. For them to sustain the rally and reclaim their usual spot at the top of the pack, Corporate America’s profit engine needs to rev back up, analysts at Bloomberg Intelligence say.】

item.title: 默茨顾问认为德国经济停滞但有望复苏
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-梅尔茨（Friedrich Merz）的独立专家小组表示，德国经济今年将停滞不前，但由于政府计划增加支出，经济复苏指日可待。【原文：Germany’s economy will stagnate this year, though a recovery is in sight thanks to plans to ramp up government spending, Chancellor Friedrich Merz’s independent panel of experts said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行警告投资者质疑美国资产会产生连锁反应
item.description: 欧洲中央银行警告说，在唐纳德-特朗普开征关税之后，投资者对美国资产风险的担忧加剧，可能会进一步冲击世界金融体系。【原文：The European Central Bank warned that heightened investor concern over the riskiness of US assets following Donald Trump’s tariff drive could further jolt the world’s financial system.】

item.title: 迪拜酋长的公司获得 150 亿美元的房地产投资信托上市订单
item.description: 迪拜控股公司（Dubai Holding）首次公开发行的住宅房地产投资信托基金吸引了 150 亿美元的订单，募集金额达 5.84 亿美元，这是投资者对迪拜蓬勃发展的房地产市场感兴趣的最新迹象。【原文：Dubai Holding attracted $15 billion in orders for the $584 million initial public offering of its residential real estate investment trust, the latest sign of investor interest in the city’s booming property market.】

item.title: 津巴布韦锂出口商寻求延迟征税直至炼油厂开工
item.description: 津巴布韦的矿工们正在敦促政府推迟对锂精矿征收出口税，直到将锂精矿提炼成电池级产品的工厂投产为止。【原文：Miners in Zimbabwe are urging the government to defer an export tax on lithium concentrate until plants that will refine the material into battery-grade products in the country come online.】

item.title: 中国液化天然气贸易商扮演全球摇摆供应商的新角色
item.description: 中国天然气公司正在利用多样化的供应来源和灵活的发电系统，向全球摇摆供应商的角色靠拢。【原文：Chinese gas firms are taking advantage of diverse supply sources and a flexible power generation system to lean into the role of global swing suppliers.】

item.title: 卡扎克称，若基准线得以维持，欧洲央行将很快达到终端利率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马丁斯-卡扎克斯（Martins Kazaks）表示，假设未来几个月通胀率稳定在2%的基本情况得以实现，那么降息将接近尾声。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks said interest-rate cuts are nearing an end, assuming the base case for inflation stabilizing at 2% over the coming months comes to pass.】

item.title: 冰岛降息并发出信号：更多举措取决于通货膨胀率
item.description: 冰岛央行连续第五次下调关键利率，并表示进一步降息取决于通胀率是否接近目标。【原文：Iceland’s central bank lowered its key interest rate for a fifth straight meeting, and signaled further reductions depend on inflation moving closer to its target.】

item.title: 世界疯狂的鸡肉突然失去了最大供应商
item.description: 巴西南部一个家禽养殖场被查出禽流感的消息在全世界引起了反响，从中国到欧洲的买家都无法买到他们越来越想吃的鸡肉。【原文：The detection of bird flu in a single poultry farm in southern Brazil is reverberating around the world, depriving buyers from China to Europe of the chicken they’re increasingly voracious to consume.】

item.title: 埃里克-特朗普出席耗资 15 亿美元的越南度假村奠基仪式
item.description: 埃里克-特朗普（Eric Trump）出席了特朗普集团（Trump Organization）在越南北部新建的价值 15 亿美元的豪华度假村的奠基仪式，而此时越南领导人正在与美国政府谈判，以避免被征收高得吓人的关税。【原文：Eric Trump attended a groundbreaking ceremony for the Trump Organization’s new $1.5 billion luxury resort complex in northern Vietnam even as the nation’s leaders negotiate with the US administration to avoid a cripplingly high tariff.】

item.title: 台湾中央银行称让货币飙升是为了重置市场
item.description: 台湾央行表示，本月早些时候战略性地放任本币反弹，让市场对涨势的预期发挥作用，此举使本币创下了自上世纪 80 年代以来的最大升值幅度。【原文：Taiwan’s central bank said it strategically let the local dollar rally earlier this month to let market expectations for gains play out, a move that allowed the currency to post its sharpest appreciation since the 1980s.】

item.title: 裁员迫在眉睫，TikTok Shop 美国员工被要求在家工作
item.description: TikTok 周三通知美国电子商务员工在家办公，等待有关 "艰难决定 "的邮件，这表明这家社交媒体公司正准备裁员。【原文：TikTok told US e-commerce staff to work from home Wednesday while awaiting emails regarding “difficult decisions,” suggesting the social media company is preparing to cut jobs.】

item.title: 价值 1 万亿美元的科威特基金老板对私募股权投资发出警告
item.description: 全球最大的财富基金之一的负责人表示，私募股权投资的时间正在流逝，现在是收购基金向投资者返还资金的时候了。【原文：The head of one of the world’s largest wealth funds said the clock is ticking for private equity and it’s time for buyout funds to return money to investors.】

item.title: 经济和信贷增长停滞，印尼恢复降息
item.description: 印尼央行今年第二次下调基准利率，因为印尼盾近期的上涨使央行得以应对经济和银行贷款增长放缓的问题。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank cut its benchmark interest rate for a second time this year as the rupiah’s recent gains allowed it to address slowing growth in the economy and bank lending.】

item.title: 中美芯片紧张局势有可能危及贸易停战和对话
item.description: 中美科技紧张局势再度升级，中国政府威胁要对任何执行华盛顿对华为技术公司芯片限制措施的人采取法律行动，这给最近达成的贸易休战和维持对话的努力蒙上了阴影。【原文：US-China tech tensions are flaring again, with Beijing threatening legal action against anyone enforcing Washington’s restrictions on Huawei Technologies Co.’s chips, casting a shadow over a recent trade truce and efforts to sustain dialogue.】

item.title: 瑞银家族办公室客户在波动中关注对冲基金投资
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的家族办公室客户正倾向于对冲基金配置，因为他们更注重积极的策略，以帮助驾驭不断变化的宏观经济形势。【原文：UBS Group AG’s family office clients are leaning into hedge fund allocations as they focus on more active strategies to help navigate the shifting macroeconomic landscape.】

item.title: 北欧联合银行质疑挪威住宅建设下滑的数据
item.description: 北欧联合银行（Nordea Bank Abp）的分析师指出，挪威官方数据显示住房建设低迷，这可能歪曲了实际情况。【原文：Norway’s official data showing sluggish housing construction may skew the real picture, according to analysts with Nordea Bank Abp, who cited competing evidence of a rise in housing starts.】

item.title: 俄罗斯输往印度的石油继续反弹，远东油流增加
item.description: 5 月份，印度对俄罗斯石油的进口量有望达到 10 个月来的最高水平，随着美国全面制裁后供应链的重建，更多原油从东部港口进口。【原文：India’s imports of Russian oil are on track for the highest level in 10 months in May, with more crude being sourced from eastern ports as supply chains are rebuilt after sweeping US sanctions.】

item.title: 交易员减少对英国央行减息的押注，英镑在英国通胀后攀升
item.description: 在数据显示英国4月份通胀增幅超过预期之后，交易员们减少了对英国央行进一步降息的押注，英镑兑美元汇率因此创下三年来的新高。【原文：Traders pared bets on further interest-rate cuts from the Bank of England, sending the pound to a three-year high versus the dollar, after data showed UK inflation rose more than expected in April.】

item.title: 房东 GPE 预计供应短缺将导致租金上涨
item.description: 房东 Great Portland Estates Plc 预计，明年伦敦写字楼租金将飙升，因为新开发项目短缺，而对最佳新办公空间的需求强劲。【原文：Landlord Great Portland Estates Plc expects London office rents to surge next year as a shortage of new development collides with robust demand for the best new space.】

item.title: 国际能源署称：关键矿产遭受痛苦破坏的风险更高
item.description: 国际能源机构的一份报告指出，由于关键矿产高度集中在少数几个国家，而且出口限制不断扩大，这些矿产遭受 "痛苦破坏 "的风险与日俱增。【原文：Critical minerals are at increasing risk of “painful disruption” due to their higher concentration in a handful of countries and the spread of export restrictions, according to a report from the International Energy Agency.】
